member.name: P:BarcodeScannerForPC.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:BarcodeScannerForPC.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:BarcodeScannerForPC.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: E:BarcodeScannerForPC.BarcodeReceiver.BarcodeReceived
member.summary: This event is raised when a barcode has been received from the scanner app.

member.name: M:BarcodeScannerForPC.BarcodeReceiver.Start
member.summary: Binds an UDP socket to a free port, and starts the barcode receiver. Use GetLocalPort() to get the local port of the UDP socket.
member.returns: True on success and false on failure.

member.name: M:BarcodeScannerForPC.BarcodeReceiver.GetLocalPort
member.summary: Gets the local port of the UDP socket.
member.returns: An UDP port number as an Integer.

member.name: M:BarcodeScannerForPC.BarcodeReceiver.bw_RunWorkerCompleted(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs)
member.summary: When a barcode has been received, this event is called. This event is called on the main thread, so raising our own events here make them thread safe.

member.name: T:BarcodeScannerForPC.BarcodeReceiver
member.summary: The BarcodeReceiver receives barcodes from the scanner app and raises an event when a barcode has been received.
